about_the_game:
What's a deck-builder builder? Craft a garden that produces cards for your deck. Carefully cultivate your garden to grow a powerful deck over the seasons and take advantage of the power they bloom.

Base building meets deck building

Cultivate a strong deck by strategically planning what plants to grow when and where. Utilize plant adjacency and tile bonuses to craft an efficient deck.

Different deck every season

After every battle, a season passes and your deck changes. Different plants come in and out of season creating different permutations of your deck. Play creatively and plan strategically around the different growth cycles of your plants.

Order matters

Every card you play adds power to your meter. Cards you play during high power have double their effect. If you plan wisely, you can turn any battle around.

Heartfelt narrative

Play as Luna as she fights seasonal depression and her fears of the city to leave the house. You will face manifestations of Luna's fears like claustrophobia and falling into the cracks in the subway, as you journey through the Caged City. Don’t let them stop you from finding your courage and peace in the concrete.

short_description: Wild Seasons is a roguelike, card battler where deck-building meets base-building. Cultivate a garden that grows mystical cards, orchestrate unique decks as your plants go in and out of season, and coordinate strategic plays across multiple turns to unleash wildly powerful combos!
